item.description:
Hi again,

Ok........now all spots are filled........excellent!

I spoke with the Pro Shop and the earliest tee times are 9:30 and 9:50 on Saturday. So, we've got those spots for two foursomes.

I spoke with the Head Pro (Matt Hibbert) and he said that the club needs a seven day notice for changes/cancellations of groups of eight or more (like ours...at this point).

My credit card is holding eight spots (I gotta say that I was surprised about the seven day notice......I'm skeptical about this).......but, anyway if anyone has to cancel; please let me know as soon as possible so I can try to fill the spot.

Ok........I'll be at the Pro Shop around 9:00 to meet and greet.

Here's the website:

http://www.butterbroo...

It's $76....this includes a (motorized) cart.

The course is tough but fun.

I'll see you out there!

Jon
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have the "Metro/West Golf" sign by the Pro Shop.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Butter Brook Golf Club
